title: Assisted Living | Vitalia Mentor
text: Considering assisted living can be a challenging part of life. The talented, dedicated staff at VITALIA速 Mentor in Mentor, OH is here to support and guide you so you can get back to the lifestyle you love. Our care plans are tailor-made to help you reach your health and wellness goals. No matter what level of care, we are here to help and restore your independence and zest for life! The path to independence is forged in different ways for different people. Care plans are developed in collaboration with the resident, Wellness Director, and family to create a comprehensive and unique blueprint for that resident and no one but that resident.
